name: Swirl - Complete
description:
Colorful Lissajous figures dance across the screen in this generative p5.js piece.

Click or tap to create a new pattern.

Press the following keys to change the piece:

1 for black on white mode.
2 for white on black mode.
3 for color on black mode.
4 for color on white mode.
5 for color on color mode.

Press the 'a' key to turn on auto refresh. This causes the piece to recreate itself every 30 seconds, with a new random pattern. Press 'a' again to turn off auto refresh.

Press the 'r' key to turn on rotate mode. This causes the piece to rotate between the 5 color modes when auto refreshing. Press 'r' again to turn off rotate mode.

This complete version of the Swirl series was created as a gift for collectors of my work.
